Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: counterclockwise adj : in the direction opposite to the rotation of the hands of a clock [syn: {anticlockwise}, {contraclockwise}] [ant: {clockwise}] adv : in a direction opposite to the direction in which the hands of a clock move; "please move counterclockwise in a circle!" [syn: {anticlockwise}] [ant: {clockwise}]
